Game.Name: Pokémon Clover
Game.Plot: This time, we will set out foot on the newly founded Fochun Region. It is a place where many kinds of strange Pokemon are filled everywhere. And also, Fochun Region is one of the mysterious origins which have been modeled by the Kantonian Japanese for a period of time. There was a god and he created this region, after that he commanded his people to develop it until now. Well, that’s a myth. You are a ten years old child who just come out of the Veepier Town to set on a new journey and become a Champion.
